resources.string: Welcome to your first day at Silverman Bags! You are starting out as a stock analyst and we are going to start you off by throwing you right into trading with a small fund we set up for you to prove your trading skill. Each week we will give you a set of stocks to choose from and goals to hit for promotion.
This week is going to be good for you, I can feel it in my bones.
This is going to be a rough week according to our analysts. We\'re confident that you\'ll make great trades though.
